inputs.name: EnvironmentName
inputs.label: Target Machine Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Machine Group for copying files.​

inputs.name: MachineNames
inputs.label: Copy to Machines
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the exact same machine name used while creating the Machine Group. Use comma to separate multiple machine names.

inputs.name: SourcePath
inputs.label: Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of the source folder or file. Variables like $(Build.Repository.LocalPath) can be used for binaries in the Automation Agent. For example, $(Build.Repository.LocalPath)\BudgetIT\Web.

inputs.name: TargetPath
inputs.label: Destination Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Local Path on the target machines for copying the files from the source. Environment variable can be used. For example, $env:windir\BudgetIT\Web.

inputs.name: CleanTargetBeforeCopy
inputs.label: Clean Target
inputs.helpMarkDown: Setting it to true will clean up the destination folder before copying the files.

inputs.name: DeployFilesInParallel
inputs.label: Copy Files Parallely
inputs.helpMarkDown: Setting it to true will copying files parellely on the machines.
